cause.description:
Each year America wastes over 100 billion pounds of food while over 700 million people world-wide are thankful to engulf a bread crumb. Have a heart and, please, donate what you can. The Proceeds go to a group called Food for the hungry, Inc. They help world hunger through the means of child sponsorship, emergency relief and rehabilitation, community clean water projects, health education and intervention, agriculture development, income generation, skills training and education. If you do not have a credit card, please invite your friends to the site. agape means "love," let us show love for those who need it most.
Here's their site: http://www.fh.org/
1. Everyone has the right to have a meal.
